Instrument.name: TERMOSKAN
Instrument.description: The scientific objectives of this experiment were the following: (1) investigation of the daily and seasonal dynamics of the temperature condition on the surface; (2) measurement of the thermal inertia of martian soil; (3) detection of the humidified regions of surface and subsurface ice formations; (4) searching of the sources of internal heat.
